desc: Inshala Academy is an online portal that invites you to heal through the magic of the Akashic Records. Led and channeled by Sofia Araya, an international spiritual life coach and teacher. She also facilitates energy healings, space clearings, Akashic Records reading and more, available worldwide in english and spanish.

layout.text: INTERNATIONAL SPIRITUAL LIFE COACH AND TEACHER
Akashic Records, Intuitive Healer, Light Language, Reiki, Space Clearings.
